title: Panipat
writer: Ranjeet Bahadur, Ashok Chakradhar, Chandrashekhar Dhavalikar
short_cast: Arjun Kapoor, Sanjay Dutt, Kriti Sanon, Zeenat Aman, Mohnish Bahl, Padmini Kolhapure, Kunal Kapoor, Suhasini Mulay
cast: Arjun Kapoor, Sanjay Dutt, Kriti Sanon, Zeenat Aman, Mohnish Bahl, Padmini Kolhapure, Kunal Kapoor, Suhasini Mulay
genre: Military Movies, Movies Based on Real Life, Hindi-Language Movies, Bollywood Movies, Dramas, Romantic Movies

desc: In 18th-century India, a Maratha commander leads his army in preparation for a fierce battle against Afghan invaders in this film based on real events.
